summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessment levied for the improvement of 55th Avenue Northeast, and certain other streets and avenues, by sewers, etc., Local Improvement District No. 5581, on the portion of the south 30 feet of the Northwest one-quarter of the Southeast one-quarter of Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., lying between the production south of the west line of 46th Avenue Northeast, as platted in Laurelvista Addition, and a line 100 feet west of and parallel therewith; and providing for the refunding of the principal of said assessment to the payors thereof.
